data.name: RPG Maker VX Ace - RPG Maker XP Remastered OST
data.detailed_description:
"RPG Maker XP Remastered OST" features 64 tracks originally released with RPG Maker XP: remade, remastered, rebuilt from the ground up to be even more spectacular than they've ever been.

Features:

  • 64 instrumental tracks rebuilt from RPG Maker XP
  • .mp3, .ogg, .wav file formats are included.
  • The mp3 version of the album and 3 tracks of remixed version are included as a bonus!

BGM list
  • Battle 1-4
  • Boss 1-4
  • Castle 1
  • Church 1
  • Dungeon 1-8
  • Field 1-5
  • Heaven 1
  • LastBoss 1-3
  • Negative 1-6
  • Positive 1-9
  • Ship 1
  • Slow 1-7
  • Theme 1-6
  • Town 1-8

Remix list

  • Battle 1
  • Bass 1
  • Field 1

data.short_description: Miss the awesome tunes from RPG Maker XP? We've brought them back - remastered and improved!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
  • Graphics:1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Hard Drive:400 MB HD space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
